trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the selected dates in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Incapsula una raccolta di <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> gli oggetti che rappresentano le date selezionate in un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the selected dates in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa classe per gestire a livello di codice un insieme di <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>gli oggetti che rappresentano le date selezionate in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This class is commonly used to add or remove dates from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe è utilizzata comunemente per aggiungere o rimuovere le date dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: This collection stores only whole dates.
trans-unit.target: Questa raccolta archivia solo date.

trans-unit.source: The time portion of each <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> is removed.
trans-unit.target: La porzione dell'ora di ogni <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>viene rimosso.</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The dates are stored in ascending order.
trans-unit.target: Le date vengono archiviate in ordine crescente.

trans-unit.source: If there are duplicate dates, only one date is stored in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Se sono presenti date duplicate, solo una data viene archiviata nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> class with the specified date list.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> classe con l'elenco di date specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo costruttore per creare una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Questo costruttore viene utilizzato principalmente dagli sviluppatori di controlli quando si estende la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that represents a collection of dates.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> che rappresenta una raccolta di date.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> oggetto alla fine del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per aggiungere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto alla fine del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> </xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> oggetti dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Count%2A> property to 0.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere tutti <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>oggetti dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>insieme e impostare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Count%2A>proprietà su 0.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> </xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection contains the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> raccolta contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection contains the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per determinare se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>raccolta contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto.</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> per la ricerca nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> contiene l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting with the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme all'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, a partire dall'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per copiare il contenuto del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>insieme nell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, a partire dall'indice specificato.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il `array` parametro deve essere in base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: In base zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> che riceve gli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the items.
trans-unit.target: Il primo indice nell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> degli elementi.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il numero di <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of dates in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare il numero di date di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is often used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà Count viene spesso utilizzata quando si scorre la raccolta per determinare il limite superiore.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> gli oggetti di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementato l'oggetto che contiene tutti <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> gli oggetti all'interno di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per creare un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-oggetto implementato che sia possibile scorrere facilmente per ottenere ogni elemento di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per ottenere l'elemento attualmente fa riferimento nella raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per spostare l'elemento successivo della raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator back to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eseguire il metodo per spostare l'enumeratore per la posizione iniziale.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method needs to be called after creating an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object or using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) deve essere chiamato dopo la creazione di un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-oggetto implementato o l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per spostare l'enumeratore al primo elemento nella raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, l'elemento rappresentato dal <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà non è definita.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects within the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implementato l'oggetto che contiene tutti <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> gli oggetti all'interno di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce sempre `false` per indicare che il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>raccolta può essere scritta in tutti i casi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'accesso per il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> raccolta è sincronizzata (thread-safe).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è derivata da <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>e viene eseguito l'override per restituire sempre `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla proprietà IsSynchronized, vedere il <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà del <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato nella <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get an individual <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection at the specified index using simple array notation.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare l'indicizzatore per ottenere un singolo <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato utilizzando la notazione di matrice semplice.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> </xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index value that specifies which <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> to return.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di indice ordinale che specifica quali <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> da restituire.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that represents an element in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> che rappresenta un elemento di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> dall'oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>dall'oggetto di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> </xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> per rimuovere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified range of dates to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'intervallo di date specificato il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add the specified range of dates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per aggiungere l'intervallo di date specificato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that specifies the initial date to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> che specifica la data iniziale per aggiungere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that specifies the end date to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> che specifica la data di fine per aggiungere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto restituito in questa implementazione è il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>oggetto stesso.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla proprietà SyncRoot, vedere il <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà del <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso alla raccolta.
